banner.title: Cookies & privacy
banner.body: We use essential cookies to keep this site running. Optional analytics cookies (Google Analytics 4) help us understand usage anonymously, but only after you consent.

preferences.title: Cookie settings
preferences.description: You can adjust your choice at any time. Essential cookies are required for security, language, and saving your consent state, so they always remain active.
preferences.essentialDescription: Required for core functions like navigation, security, and remembering your cookie decision.
preferences.analyticsDescription: Enables anonymous measurement with IP anonymization. No personal data is stored or combined with other Google services.

notifications.saved: Your cookie settings have been saved.
